Slowly, she moves her way up the roof. Every  few seconds Jamie looks behind them to see if Michael is  following. Rachel reaches the very top of the roof. She tries to rea for the arched part of the roof, but misses. She tries  again, but still doesn't make it. As she reaches out agai a shingle her foot was on comes loose and they go sliding back down the roof. Rachel grabs onto the pipe to stop he descent. Jamie starts to slide off her back. Rachel grabs her and pulls her up.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Grab on, Jamie. Jamie gets onto Rachel's back. Rachel starts up the roof  once again. This time, she grabs a black cord to steady  her. Jamie gets off Rachel's back and looks behind them.  She screams. Michael is pulling himself up onto the roof. Rachel grabs Jamie, and, using the cord, climbs over to the far side o the roof. Rachel lifts Jamie up and over.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: I'm gonna lower you to the chimney, okay Jamie?

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: I can't.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Well try dammit! She starts to lower Jamie. Suddenly, Michael appears!

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Rachel!  Jamie slips and slides down to the chimney. Rachel looks  behind her and takes a swipe at her with his knife. Rache barely dodges. By this time, Jamie is already to the  chimney. Michael takes another swipe at Rachel. Rachel  rolls down the roof and hits the chimney. She gets up and faces Jamie. She gets the cord and ties it around Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: I'm gonna lower you down Jamie okay?  Jamie climbs over the edge.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Rachel!

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: I've got you come on, go down.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Rachel! Rachel I've got you Jamie.  She starts to slowly lower Jamie down the side of the  house.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: I've got you, I've got you.  Jamie is dangling above the ground, her clown mask pushed to the side of her neck. She struggles, her legs flailing in the air. Rachel continues to lower Jamie when Michael suddenly  appears! She lets go of the cable, making Jamie drop abou halfway down. Rachel rolls out of the way as Michael take a swipe at her with his knife. He places his hand on the  chimney for support. He again takes a swipe at Rachel,  causing her to roll to the edge of the roof. Michael slowly heads for her. Rachel dangles above the  ground, her hands holding onto the roof for dear life. Sh starts to slowly move to the side, away from Michael.  Jamie grabs onto the ledge of the house and hoists hersel onto it. Michael swings his knife at Rachel, causing her to lose h grip. She plummets to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Ahhhhhhhhhhh! THUD! Michael stands there, breathing heavily, just stari at Rachel's unmoving body.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Jamie climbs the rest of the way down and runs over to  Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Oh please come alive Rachel, please come alive. You can't be dead. Come alive Rachel! Jamie lays her head on Rachel's shoulder and begins  sobbing. Michael appears at the side of the house. Jamie  glances over at him, then at Rachel. She looks back at  Michael and begins to run.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Help! Please, somebody help me! Help! Please! Somebody he me! Jamie runs by house after house, calling for help. She  looks behind her, sees Michael appear from behind a bush, and runs faster. She trips, gets back up, and continues  running.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Rachel, laying on the ground. She moves slightly.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Jamie. She's no longer running. She's walking slowly,  looking around. Suddenly, she sees something off screen a begins running. But, before she gets anywhere, she runs  into Dr. Loomis. He grabs her, tries to comfort her.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: What are you doing out here alone?

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Everybody's dead. I just wanna go home.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: Oh no you can't. I've just been there. That's the first  place he'll look for you. Where's the school house? Where is the school house?

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: It's over there. She points to somewhere behind Loomis.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: Come on. Come we'll be safe there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Loomis and Jamie walk over to the doors. Loomis grabs Jamie and holds her tight as he raises his gun and fires  four times at the door. He and Jamie walk up the steps.  When he opens the door, the alarms go off. Dr. Loomis and Jamie enter the school, closing the door behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loomis and Jamie walk up the steps. Loomis tries the firs door he comes across, but it's locked.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: We'll hear sirens soon.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Then we'll be safe?

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: Yeah.  He tries another door, but it's locked too.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: You don't believe that do you?

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: No.  They hug. Loomis turns to leave when Michael appears,  grabbing Loomis and throwing him through a door, breaking the glass and the door. Jamie screams and runs down the  hall, trying to open the doors. She comes to the last doo and tries to open it, but it's locked. She pounds on it.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Oh, oh. Somebody help me! She walks over to the end of the hall and crouches, putti her arms over her face.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: No. She begins sobbing. When nothing happens, she looks down  the hall. There's no sign of Michael. Jamie slowly stands up. She looks around her, not believing that Michael is  really gone. She starts to slowly walk down the hall,  peering into every corner, every dark room. Michael could be anywhere. She comes to split in the hallway. On one  side, stairs leading down to an entrance and another  hallway. On the other, stairs leading to the second floor

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: Ahhhhhhhhh! Michael stands on the steps, knife in hand. Jamie begins run down the other steps but she trips and tumbles down t steps, landing with a soft thud. She looks up at the top the stairs and she sees Michael begin to slowly descend  them. Jamie starts to crawl away, but Michael's hand grab her leg, pulling her back. She screams just as

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL APPEARS,
dialogues.text: a fire extinguisher in her hand. She begins to spray  Michael with it. He is instantly covered in smoke. He hol his hands up, trying to ward it off. Rachel continues  spraying Michael.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A truck with Earl, Al and two other hillbillies comes dow the road. One guy bangs on the roof to get Earl's  attention.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: In the school. Pull over Earl.  They pull up to the school. They all pile out of the truc when Rachel comes out, carrying Jamie. They rush over to  her.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: What's going on here? We heard the alarm.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: He's inside.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Jesus. Where?

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: In the school.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael is gone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all discuss what to do.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Let's get this bastard.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE
dialogues.text: No! He'll kill you too.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: We have to get out of Haddonfield, the state police at on their way let them handle it.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: I don't know about you Earl, but that makes sense to me.  Lets get the hell out.

dialogues.speaker: AL
dialogues.text: He's not our patient. Let the troopers have him. That's  what they get paid for.

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Screw it. Lets get out of here. Al. Al takes Jamie from Rachel while the others pile into the truck. Al opens the passenger side door and put Jamie dow next to Earl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck flies along the road, the hillbillies lights  shining into the night. They pass a sign saying "WELCOME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie sits in Rachel's lap, both tired and hungry. Earl  glances at them, then back at the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two hillbillies have their guns and lights propped up on  the roof of the truck, keeping an eye out. Al sits by the tailgate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earl reaches for the CB. He talks into it.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Okay everybody, listen up. I've got Rachel Corruthers and her sister in the truck, and I'm taking them outta town  route 410. State police are on the way. Got that?

dialogues.speaker: GUY
dialogues.text: Got it Earl.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Okay, out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long line of cop cars comes speeding down the road,  sirens blazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel looks at Jamie, happy to have her safe. Earl looks out the front window and sees the long line of cop cars. turns to Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Here comes the calvary now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One hillbilly swings his flashlight back and forth while  the other fires his shotgun into the night. All the cars by except one. It stops and waits for Earl to pull up. Th COP gets out of his car.

dialogues.speaker: COP
dialogues.text: Coming outta Haddonfield?

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Yeah right outta the elementary school, taking these kids to safety.

dialogues.speaker: COP
dialogues.text: Okay, there's a highway patrol substation about 4 miles  down the highway. You'll see the turnoff signs. Now we've got officers on duty, they'll take care of you.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Thanks.  Earl puts his foot on the gas and drives away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earl looks over at Rachel and Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: You'll be okay.  Rachel tries to manage a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Al sits near the tailgate, watching the road behind them. The other two hillbillies keep their eyes on the road ahe of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are seeing from behind Earl. The road ahead is foggy a nothing is certain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tailgate. Suddenly, Michael's hand appear, then the  other one with the knife. He begins to haul himself up in the bed of the truck. None of them notice Michael until  it's too late. One hillbilly turns, and tries to hit  Michael with his shotgun, but Michael grabs it and stabs  him in the back with the knife. Michael throws his body down just as Al gets up. Michael  stabs him in the side, and throws his body against the  tailgate. The tailgate busts open and Al's and the  hillbilly's bodies go tumbling off the truck and onto the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel, Earl, and Jamie are completely oblivious to what' happening to the three hillbillies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael throws the last hillbilly off of the truck. He go rolling down the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earl is getting nervous. He heard some noises. He looks o the back window when

dialogues.speaker: MICHAEL'S HAND BREAKS THROUGH THE DRIVERS SIDE WINDOW
dialogues.text: and latch on to Earl's neck. His fingers dig deep into  Earl's neck, drawing blood. Jamie and Rachel scream as  Michael twists Earl's neck open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck swerves dangerously, Michael on the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie falls into the floorboard, screaming. Rachel pushes Earl's body aside and gets behind the wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It swerves, Michael still clinging to the top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel opens the door and pushes Earl's body out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earl's lifeless body flies out of the truck and rolls dow the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel reaches over to the door and closes it. Jamie stil hides in the floorboards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael swings his hand inside the truck, trying to grab  Rachel. She whips the wheel this way and that, trying to  make Michael fall off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael's hand swings into the truck. Rachel tries to avo it while maintaining control over the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael swerves from side to side, barely hanging on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel jerks the wheel to the right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael almost falls off, but he manages to keep his grip

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel jerks the wheel, causing Jamie to fall into the  floorboard and hit her head.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Jamie! Rachel continues to jerk the wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It moves to the right, then the left. Michael's body is  thrown every which way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael's hand reaches into the truck and grabs hold of  Rachel's sweater. Rachel fights free, but Michael rips he sweater. She screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It swerves all over the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael's face smashes into the front windshield. Rachel  screams and pushes down on the brakes. Jamie falls back  into the floorboards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael goes flying off the truck. He rolls onto the road

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie slowly peeks over the seat. Rachel looks out the  window and sees Michael slowly stand up. She messes with  the gear shift.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Die you son of a bitch.  She steps on the gas, and the truck goes forward at a fas rate, knocking into Michael. He goes flying into the air  and lands on the ground near a mine. The truck rolls down the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel presses the brakes, praying that the truck will  stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck comes to a stop. Through the window we see Rach sigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The police cars comes speeding down the road, heading for Rachel and Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael's hand. It still has a grip on the knife. Slowly, the grip loosens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie stares at Michael, fascinated.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Jamie, I want you to stay right here in the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meeker is the first one to arrive. Rachel races over to  him.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Sheriff Meeker, we killed him.

dialogues.speaker: MEEKER
dialogues.text: Calm down. Calm down. Are you all right? Are you all righ Rachel nods.

dialogues.speaker: MEEKER
dialogues.text: Where's Jamie?

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Jamie. She kneels down beside Michael. She takes his hand and holds it, looking at the scars caused by the fire.

dialogues.speaker: MEEKER
dialogues.text: Jamie! Get away!

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Don't touch him Jamie! Jamie drops his hand and turns to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael's hand. It grabs the knife.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAL VIEW
dialogues.text: Michael sits up.

dialogues.speaker: MEEKER
dialogues.text: Get down! Jamie jumps to the ground just as Michael gets to his fee Meeker pulls the trigger on his shotgun and BAM! a bullet hits Michael dead on. He's knocked back. The other cops a hillbillies open fire, creating a dazzling display of  light. Bullet after bullet slams into Michael, causing hi to step back. A few bullets hit the ground around Michael but most hit home. Rachel covers her ears as the sounds o bullets being fired echoes all around her. Meeker takes  aim, and fires, his bullet knocking Michael back. More an more bullets rain down on Michael, causing one of the mos terrifying killers ever to stumble backwards, until he  slips and falls down an abandoned mine shaft, hopefully t his death. The guns go quiet as everybody realizes that Michael is  gone. Meeker breaths deeply, satisfied. No human could ha survived that onslaught of bullets. No one. Wood and dirt crumble into the mine, burying Michael.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything is quiet. Peaceful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Richard and Darlene hug Jamie and Rachel when they walk i escorted by Meeker.

dialogues.speaker: RICHARD
dialogues.text: Oh, babies. Meeker walks over to the front door and opens it. Loomis  limps in.

dialogues.speaker: MEEKER
dialogues.text: It's over.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: Yes. Michael Myers is in hell, buried, where he belongs. Meeker sits down in a chair.

dialogues.speaker: MEEKER
dialogues.text: These kids aren't likely to forget.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: They've survived this ordeal, they'll survive it's memory Rachel is completely exhausted, dried blood caked to her  face.

dialogues.speaker: DARLENE
dialogues.text: I'm going to take Jamie upstairs.  She puts her hand on Richard's knee.

dialogues.speaker: DARLENE
dialogues.text: (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay with Rachel.  (to Jamie) Come on honey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darlene turns on the water, letting it fill the tub.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The person looks at a darkened room, then down the hall. turns right and looks into a small bathroom. A pair of  scissors lays on the sink. They're picked up by someone o screen. The POV returns to the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tub is halfway full. Darlene, in a robe, lays two  towels down on the edge  of the tub.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a mask slides onto the person's face. We are no only seeing through the two eye holes. We make our way to the end of the hall. We turn, and stare at Darlene, hunch over the tub. She looks over at the person.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhhhhhh!!! Loomis comes hobbling up the steps, then stops.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: No. No! Jamie stands at the top of the stairs, a bloody pair of  scissors held in her hand. Her costume is flecked with  blood...

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: No! No! No! No! He raises his gun to shoot her.

dialogues.speaker: LOOMIS
dialogues.text: No! Suddenly, Meeker jumps at him, knocking the gun out of hi hand. Loomis falls to the ground, sobbing. Meeker grabs h gun and points it, but can only stare when he sees that  it's Jamie. Richard comes up the stairs, quickly followed by Rachel. They both stop, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie. She raises the scissors into the air.
